name: bookstack
description: BookStack is an easy-to-use self-hosted documentation platform. It allows users to organize content in a structured hierarchy using books, chapters, and pages, and comes with markdown support, permissions, and a WYSIWYG editor.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Rich text editing with visual interface. Easy formatting

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Write in markdown for faster documentation. Flexible authoring

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Control access with granular permissions. Secure collaboration

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Powerful search across all documentation. Find anything instantly

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes and restore previous versions. Never lose work

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your documentation. Data ownership
